Archiving Tasks
---------------

Archiving tasks can be done by the task number, by the project, or by a context.

.. warning:: 

   Archiving tasks will change the numbers of the remaining tasks, so always
   run a new search after an archive before archiving a second time

CLI Commands
============

.. argparse::
   :ref: taskshell.cli.archive_cmd
   :prog: tasker

   These commands are available in the shell
